name: Register Project
description: It's te first project I made in PHP, it's a register form with a database connection, it's little responsive, I learned some things for my nexts projects.

name: Nike Clone
description: This project is a clone of the nike, I get it my personal style, it was the first big project that I did, I learned a lot of thing, for example, login system, get data from join tables, CRUD, etc. This project was , I did it with PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap. U: user - P: password

name: Puzzle Practice
description: This project is a puzzle game, it's made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, it's a simple layout, I practiced a lot with the logic of the game, also I did with a library, I can say that this libary was the first I used in my projects.

name: Control DOM
description: Here I could practice with the DOM, I could add, remove and modify elements, I could also add events to the elements, add conditional styles depending on the events that happened

name: Roles Project
description: Here I could practice with the DOM, add conditional styles depending on the events that happened, I also render pages depending of role, each role can do it a different functions, some can do it all, while other only 1 thing, visit the calculator page, also you can loggin with the differents accounts that I created for you, so that you can see all features that I did, then if you want to test the application, you can do it with the nexts accounts. U: username - P: password
indications: Logueado: Just register on the app

name: Quiz Js
description: This project is the simple quiz about Javascript, I did with vanilla js, I had to practice for resolve the problems that I'm fiding of the road, It's a simple layout but I'm proud of it, I learned a lot with this project, I hope you like it.

name: Calculator
description: The calculator is the most popular project that we can do it for initial our walk in the world of programming, I did it with vanilla js, although I had done in the other languages, I never do it with javascript

name: Dashboard
description: With this project, I practiced a lot of css, I did it with grid and flexbox, I also align the elements in the layout for the good view of the page.

name: Poke Api
description: The poke api is the first project public that I did with fetch, I did it but it was in other repositorioes and projects, this project I trusted to do the best possible, I did it with vanilla js, I practiced a lot with the api, I learned a lot with this project, I hope you like it.
indications: You can search the pokemon by name or id
You can see the stats of the pokemon if you click on the card

name: Triki Game
description: This project is the triki game, I did it with vanilla js, The game consist in that the first player put a X in the board, then the bot put a O, and the first player put a X, and so on, the first player that put three X or O in a row, column or diagonal, win the game, I did it with the poo paradigm.

name: Old Portfolio
description: This portfolio help me to practice animations and styles, I did it with vanilla js, I learned a lot with this project, I hope you like it.

name: Follow Card
description: The first project I did with React js, I practiced with the useState and simple components, also I learned how React work with the virtual DOM, how it's render the components, the props, and how to compile the code.

name: Triki Update
description: This project is the update of the triki game that I did with vanilla js, this time I did it with React js, I practiced with the useState, useEffect, and I modifing the game logic, now it's make to play with two players, adding the logic of the turns, and the winner, I also did the logic of the draw, and the logic of the restart button. Really good practice with this.

name: Mouse Follow
description: With this project I was be able to practice with the useState, useEffect, I also add and remove event listeners of the components, I learning how the function of the event listeners in js

name: Credits People
description: This project was the test that I did, when I practiced React tought with MongoDB, I also I did it with react router DOM, connect with node js for the make the CRUD

name: MiAnthro
description: With this project we achieve that the colombians nutritionist reduce their work from 8 hours to 5 minutes, I could practice a lot of things for example, Zustand, updload images to cloudinary, notifications to email, routes protectection, and how I could scale this project, I could make frontend and backend, I also did the design of the project, I did it with figma, and I could deploy to Nelify and Railway. This project used the artificial intelligence for get nutritional valoration for boys between 0 to 2 years old
